body.name: Tablet 10.1 Inch Android 13 Octa-core with 8(4+4) GB+128GB Tablets, 5MP+8MP Camera, Bluetooth 5.0 Tablet PC (Gray)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 56 mins
features: 【High Performance Android 13 Tablet】: The Android tablet uses the operating system "Android 13". The Android 13 has upgraded personal privacy protection and security, and has personalized functions to improve basic fluency And control application access to data. Using an Android 13 tablet is smoother and faster. Not only experience stable Google services, but also install favorite third-party applications such as Netflix/YouTube/Facebook/Twitter.

【Enough Storage】: Tablet 10 inch comes with 8GB(4GB+4GB expansion) RAM and 128GB storage space with a built-in Micro SD card slot (expandable up to 1TB), which provides more storage options.These configurations allow the Android tablet to have a fast response speed, allowing you to have a good gaming experience. Simultaneously playlists, online classes, virtual learning, video conferencing and office work this tablet is a perfect companion.

【HD 1280*800 Display】: This tablet has a 10.1 inch 1280*800 resolution full screen, wide viewing angle, high-resolution images, and perfect vision. Wide viewing angle IPS HD screen, you can enjoy more realistic and powerful images.

【Large Battery Capacity】: Tablet equipped with a 5000mAh high-capacity battery, it can easily support you to enjoy reading and browsing for a longer period of time. NOTE: Battery life depends on device settings and application usage.

【Multifunctional Tablet 10.1 Inch】: With 5MP front and 8MP rear cameras, built-in noise-canceling microphone, Type-C charging port, Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0, it has everything you need for virtual learning and video calling on the go.
body.description: With Octa-core CPU and a 2.0GHz A55 architecture technology allows for low heat generation and low power consumption.It offers a number of improved features that make operation simpler and processing quicker.Tablet Information:Colour: Gray / BlackSystem: Android 13Screen Size: 10.1 inchesScreen Resolution: 1280 * 800 IPSBattery: 5000 mAhRAM: 8GB(4GB+4GB expansion)ROM : 128GBExtended Support: Expand 1TB with Micro SD CardDual Camera: Rear 8.0MP / Front 5.0MPSupport: Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0What is in the box:- 1 tablet- 1 user manual- 1 x C type small cable- 1 chargerNotice:Offer a 1-year return and exchange service. To ensure the quality of our service, if you have any questions about this tablet, please contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tablet has a stylish design, a vibrant display and a responsive touch interface. Its performance is commendable for everyday tasks, although demanding applications may experience a slight lag. Battery life is satisfactory, offering a lot of use on a single charge. The quality of the camera is decent, suitable for taking pictures from time to time. Overall, a reliable choice for general use at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality android tablet!
reviews.reviewText: This android tablet is a very good quality one, has enough memory and you can surf the web pretty fast.I can chat, and use different platforms at the same time and this is super cool for me, because it doesn't slow me down on the things I need to do.I like that YouTube also doesn't get stuck all the time.I like the camera is pretty fair, the photos are good quality, the battery life is also good, I can use it for a good amount of time before charging again.The price is fairly good and affordable, I mean we don't see many good tablets for this price, so I think is a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tablet works very well. Good resolution and fast. Definitely a great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it to pull up cooking videos!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my need all the way around so YAY!! The 10.1-inch display offers crystal-clear visuals, making movie streaming and gaming incredibly enjoyable. The powerful Octa-core processor ensures smooth multitasking, and with 8GB of RAM, I never experienced any lag or slow performance. (I use it in the kitchen most of the time to view recipes and cooking videos)The 5MP+8MP camera setup is surprisingly impressive, capturing vibrant and detailed photos. It's perfect for casual photography or video calls with friends and family. The bluetooth allows for seamless pairing with my wireless headphones, giving me a truly immersive audio experience.With 128GB of storage, I have more than enough space for all my favorite apps, movies, and music. The battery life is also excellent, lasting me through hours of use without needing a recharge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product. Great price.
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a christmas gift and was (at first) unhappy it wasn't the Samsung I wanted. I kept an open mind and am very pleased by its performance, screen quality, speed, and ease of operation. Seriously, I love it. I use it everyday. Certainly would recommend it to anyone. I use it on our house wifi and I can zip around the internet very easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Excellence: 10.1 Inch Android Tablet with Octa-core Power
reviews.reviewText: The 10.1-inch display provides vibrant visuals, offering an enjoyable experience for video streaming and browsing. Surprisingly, the tablet features a 5MP front camera and an 8MP rear camera, making it suitable for capturing moments and video calls. While it may not compete with top-tier tablets, the Tablet 10.1 Inch is a solid performer for its price range. Its sleek and durable build adds to its appeal, making it a practical choice for daily use. Considering its affordability, it's an excellent option for those on a budget and makes for a thoughtful and practical Christmas gift, especially for a grandparent. While it might not be the absolute best on the market, its impressive features and friendly price tag make it a genuinely good buy and a delightful holiday present for Grandma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Terrific bargain, good quality as well.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this tablet to replace a 21/2 year old, $800, Apple Air Pad. I was so outraged by my very gently used iPad simply dying, I refused to consider ever buying Apple again.I had not had an android tablet before the purchase of this Colfan 10.1 inch tablet.I obviously went for a bargain tablet.I’m very happy I did so.It handles all of the applications that I regularly use (Gmail, Word, Excel, etc.)It also makes for a terrific media device.No wifi problems, no Bluetooth problems (other than the ones created by Apple when pairing AirPods with anything other than an Apple product).This tablet is not super fast, but plenty fast for the uses I’ve described.The price was 1/10th the price of my AirPad, the performance is about 90 percent.The only big difference is battery life.The Coolfan has about a 3-4 hour life between charging.This is not an issue for me.I would definitely buy this tablet again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good tablet but sd card issues
reviews.reviewText: Tablet is decent with lots of storage and huge expandable option but can not format new micro SD cards.I bought two 1TB put one in the tablet and tried to reformat and the card wouldnt show after. Checked it in my phone and couldn't find it. Put the send one in the phone it reformatted no issuesExchanged the now non working as card received the be new tried to re go it at again(twice) first time it took 20 minutes but it still showed up as needing reformatted tried again and sheet a few minutes still showed needing reformatted. Placed card in phone and reformatted within a minute placed onto tablet and it worked.
